front.title: Integrated services over DiffServ network using COPS-ODRA

abstract.t: This document details the IntServ operation over a DiffServ network inthe case of dynamic admission control procedure supported by the COPSprotocol. An RSVP aware Edge Router uses the COPS protocol in order toquery a Bandwidth Broker, which manages the resources within theDiffServ domain. This document relies on the COPS extensions proposed inthe companion draft 'COPS usage for Outsourcing DiffServ ResourceAllocation' [COPS-ODRA].
